snippet: John Donovan of AT&T says that getting credit for accomplishments isn’t as important as assembling and leading the best team.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with AT&T chief technology officer John Donovan discussing his management style.
lead_paragraph: John Donovan of AT&T says that getting credit for accomplishments isn’t as important as assembling and leading the best team.

headline.print_headline: Strive for Results, But Never for the Accolades
headline.seo: John Donovan of AT&T, on Seeking Results Instead of Praise
headline.main: Strive for Results, Not for the Accolades
